title: Stuck at Login Screen on NA CLIENT
body: I have no third party programs installed for league .I  tried restarting my computer , network and client but it seems to not solve the problem. My computer runs on WIndows 10 and our network provider is Comcast. What should I do?

replies.body:
i have a the same problem rn everything is the same but i want windows 8 plox help

i tried repairing reinstalling and restarting computer

I just reinstallled again and now i can log in
bruh{{champion:202}}
What am i suppose to copy and paste over?

I've seen a number of posts regarding login issues with Comcast. I've reached out to our Network Technicians to investigate. If you have a chance, I'd like you to run some traceroutes so I have more data to provide them. Grab the networking tool [WinMTR](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/a5e0UdGB-unknown-log-in-issues), then run a trace to the IP Address 104.160.131.1 for 5 minutes. After 5 minutes has passed, export the results as text, then paste them to [this thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/a5e0UdGB-unknown-log-in-issues), where we're tracking this issue for now.

Let me know if you have any questions.
